BackstoryDef.title: lazy worker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When [PAWN_nameDef] was offered [PAWN_possessive] yearly salary in order to test a new implant, [PAWN_pronoun] jumped at the chance. Ever since then, [PAWN_nameDef] has been looking for a way to get it removed.

BackstoryDef.title: ex-military
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] always had an appetite for risk. Military life satisfied that need for a while, but eventually it wasn't enough.\n\nSeeking greater gambles, [PAWN_nameDef] took an offer from a mysterious machine persona and traveled to an unknown rimworld with a mysterious implant in [PAWN_possessive] head.

BackstoryDef.title: insurance broker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A life of insurance dealing consumed [PAWN_nameDef]'s hopes and dreams. When a mysterious machine persona offered the gambler implant, it seemed like a way to add color to a gray existence.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] did not, however, plan on being captured by pirates and sent across the galaxy to a distant rimworld.
